title: For the Young Villain’s Happy Ending
summary:
[There was a pitiful girl who cried tears of diamond and lived while being abused by her family. But a prince appeared and killed off the entirety of the evil family. And so, the girl lived happily ever after with the prince.]

...is the fairy tale, but I reincarnated as the evil sister, 'Marcia Blick'?!

This damned household! I have to escape from this house now, at least! But if I run away, what about my sister who will be left behind? I've made my decision! We're going to run away together!

'Larisa. Let's go find that prince who will make you happy!'

But: "Please marry me."

Prince, why are you proposing to me? Your partner isn't me, but my sister! This sister of yours will make you a 'perfect ending plan'!

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54970327), [Naver Series](http://naver.me/GLuxzytv)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8F%99%ED%99%94-%EC%86%8D-%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD%EC%9D%98-%EC%99%84%EB%B2%BD%ED%95%9C-%EC%97%94%EB%94%A9-%ED%94%8C%EB%9E%9C/2867), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58925157)

**Official Translations:**

* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26297&contentId=297&platform=IA)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%8F%8D%E6%B4%BE%E4%B9%9F%E6%83%B3%E8%A6%81%E6%9C%89%E5%AE%8C%E7%BE%8E%E7%B5%90%E5%B1%80/331)

* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B9%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%93%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2/382)

title: I will break ties with the harmful sister
summary:
Clara, who had been oppressed for many years by her tyrant sister, Enefia. Even their parents obeyed the sister's wishes, and Clara had no place in the Astraia Baron’s household despite it being her home. In the midst of this, Clara's sister's engagement to a prominent nobleman was decided, and Clara finally felt relieved, believing she would be freed from this hell. However, even after the engagement, the sister's unfaithful nature did not change, and fearing the fiancé might discover the inconvenient truth, the parents ordered Clara to monitor her sister. Despite Clara's efforts, her sister became pregnant with another man's child. The engagement was broken off, and the sister quickly eloped somewhere, leaving the Astraia Baron’s household with a huge debt, angering the influential nobleman. In order to repay her family's debts, Clara was sold to a sadistic noble and faced severe torture, ultimately approaching death.

"If I could do it over again... This time, I will definitely kill you!" When Clara opened her eyes again, time had rewound to the day of her sister’s engagement. Revived with strong determination, Clara pushed back against her sister's insidious bullying and ran to change the worst possible future.

title: That summers promise once again
summary: Minami is now one of the most popular young actresses, rising to the top with her natural beauty and charm. However, there's one thing that continues to trouble her. Back in middle school, she was in a serious traffic accident that left her severely injured and took a full year to recover from. As a result of the accident, she also lost all memories related to it. Since then, she has been having the same dream every single night. In that dream, someone gently whispers to her: "Don’t forget the promise we made that summer…

title: Sub-Male Lead, You Said It Was A Contract Marriage?
summary: I was possessed as a villain supporting character 1 who was executed after saying something to the female lead who seemed close to the male lead. ‘I’m a villain supporting character 1 anyway. If I don’t do it, who else will?’ With that thought in mind, I tried not to get involved with any of the characters in the original work, and the original work ended safely. The sub-male lead in the original work came to me. “Are you not interested in a contract marriage?” Waving the contract with a gentle face. *** Two years. Before the short contract marriage ended, I asked him for a divorce rather early. But he became strange. “My lady… Are you only lusting after my body?” What are you talking about? You said let’s have a contract marriage. Weren’t we in a business relationship? “It was a contract marriage from the beginning. What are you… … .” Before I knew it, tears were forming in his eyes. Several buttons on his neatly-made shirt were undone. At that moment, when I was flustered by his reddened eyes and the attention of the people, he clung to me. “Did you hate spending the night with me, Julietta? I’ll try, so don’t abandon me.” Watching his tears streaming down his cheeks, I thought. At this rate, I’ll really end up taking responsibility for him! No, Sub-Male Lead! You said you didn’t have the confidence to love someone!

title: Omniscient Reader’s Viewpoint
summary: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.

title: Academy’s Undercover Professor
summary:
Machiavelli and Gerrard are just one of the many names the new professor of Ceoren Academy uses to disguise his identity - and now he can add one more to his list, Professor Ludger Cherish. 

The real Ludger Cherish dies on board a train during a terrorist attack, making him the perfect target for a new identity. Little does the new professor know, Ludger Cherish was involved in something deep and secret. 

The new Professor Ludger has to be careful to not get caught by the school and the dangerous secret society.

title: I Became a Swordsmanship Instructor at the Academy
summary:
The protagonist is reincarnated in the body of Kang Shin-hyuk, a background character from a popular novel. Shin-hyuk decides to leave saving the world to the original protagonists and enjoy a wealthy, carefree life without interfering with the novel’s plot. 

However, he discovers discrimination against non-Hunter school graduates at the school where he works. 

To avoid being looked down upon by his fellow teachers, and to lead a comfortable life, Ayumu begins his reincarnation journey, determined to become strong enough to protect himself… even if it means slightly altering the original story.

title: The Investor Who Sees the Future
summary:
After experiencing an accident in the military, Kang Jinhu gained the ability to foresee the future. 

He decides to use this ability to invest in various companies and make money, aiming to become the world's number one investor. 

How far do the limits of his foresight extend? Beyond investments, it touches economics, politics, corporations, and even global affairs. From now on, he’s reshaping the world of finance!

title: The Hero Became The Duke’s Eldest Son
summary:
No one understands why local lowlife Lord Aden Remes suddenly acts like the upright knight he was meant to be. The truth is, Aden's been possessed by Aden Albireo, the empire's hero who died after defeating the villainous Underlord and facing betrayal by his closest friends. 

Now, Aden's out to get revenge on those who killed him with the help of a few new allies and none other than the Underlord himself! Can Aden and his gang buckle down and power up? Or is the lord hero fated to fail once more?

title: Mount Hua Sect’s Genius Phantom Swordsman
summary: After being ambushed by the Demonic Cult, Goheon Dok and Hyeonjo, his close friend from Mount Hua, are cornered and on the verge of losing their lives. Before they're both killed, Hyeonjo hands Goheon the Plum Blossom Spirit Beads, a sacred relic of Mount Hua that causes Goheon to take possession of the body of Muhwi, an apprentice of Hyeonjo. Now, as a Senior Disciple of Mount Hua, Goheon Dok must fight to protect Mount Hua and fulfill his friend's dying wish.

title: The World After The Fall
summary:
Faced with imminent defeat and certain death, would you choose to run – or continue to fight for a doomed world?

When mysterious towers appear across the world, summoning monsters that prey on mankind, this is the choice presented to the Tower Walkers – adventurers with special powers to fight the monsters.

On the brink of death, they can choose to use a “regression stone” to return to the past for a second chance, though this decision places them in a separate timeline forever.

Stubborn Tower Walker Jaehwan rejects this choice, choosing to fight for the original timeline, and learning shocking secrets about the Tower along the way.

title: The Demon Lord Hates Reverse Harem
Eleceed
summary:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)
- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/eleceed/list?title_no=2642)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2034)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000883)
- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2861)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)

title: I Adopted a Villainous Dad
summary:
One day I woke up and I was six years old. I had transmigrated into the main character of a tragic novel, Saint Priscilla, who walks through all sorts of thorny paths! Since I’m here, I need to avoid the scheduled special misfortune and live happily with my favorite character. The final boss of the story and the villain, Melchizedek, the tyrant of the Rehel Empire, who has no blood or tears! A happy life of adopting my father and becoming a princess, with my favorite character. I also saved the male protagonist, in order to remove my father’s death flag.

“If you approach my daughter, you will die.”

Why does my father keep putting up death flags?

Moreover… “If you tamed me, you have to take responsibility.”

Why is the male lead so obsessed with me? What’s going on?

---
One day, a girl awakens as 6-year-old St. Priscilla, the heroine of her most cherished novel. The catch? She is destined to suffer with an abusive adoptive family! To avoid this, she adopts her ultimate bias, the ruthless Emperor Melkiades, as her father instead. Although spending her days fangirling and redeeming her bias's tarnished name seems like a dream come true, with so many foes still lurking in the shadows, can this young saint protect Melkiades and find happiness for them both?

title: The Male Lead Is Obsessed With Proposing to Me
summary:
Trapped in a story where the male lead must love her to survive, a woman dedicates eight years to manipulating his heart — silent stalking, strategic appearances, engineered coincidences. 

But when her coldly planned "happy ending" arrives, she learns a hard lesson: you can't control love without losing yourself.

title: Regressor Instruction Manual
summary:
[Will you join the game?]

Giyoung's suddenly thrown into a game of life and death. Not only that, but he's also the player with the lowest stats. Still, he's got one skill on his side: the ability to read other players' status!

He finds the opportunity of his life when he discovers that Hyunsung is a returner to this world.

Now all Giyoung has to do is stick next to Hyunsung and game his way out of this tutorial.

title: Playing the Perfect Fox-Eyed Villain
summary: Shihu Lee has logged 20,000 hours playing Let's Kill the Demon Lord! for the past 5 years. But when the game takes a turn he doesn't like, Shihu cancels his pre-order of the DLC in anger, only to find himself sucked into the game! Now in the body of Julian Kreipart Prason, the villain, he has to play the part perfectly to survive the many enemies around him while unable to use the moonlight blade, Julian's signature ability. Under the watchful eye of Eileen, the genius gold mage, and his family members who want him gone, can Julian make it?

title: This Time, I Will Avoid This Marriage- a Method to Part Ways With You, Who Lacks Love
My School Life Pretending To Be a Worthless Person
summary:
The world discovered the essence of the human soul, Ideia, and found a way to materialize it. The stronger one's Ideia, the more power one has.

In a society where hierarchy is determined by this power, F-Rank Park Jinsung has always been his school's punching bag. In reality, though, he is an S-Rank with extreme bloodlust, which he has been hiding to keep others safe.

With only two years left of high school, will Jinsung be able to hide his killer side and prove rank isn't everything?

---
- [Webtoon Teaser](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RNHjCpXtHpI)

title: Black Haze (2025)
summary: A long time ago, a portal to another world was opened, and those who acquired special abilities along with marks began to be called mages. After the incident known as "that day", the first-class mage from Ophion, known as "Blow", has become very famous. One day, he receives a very special mission: to protect the second son of the Artian family, who suffers from being called a "monster" at the magic school "Helios"! Thus, Blow enrolls in Helios under the name "Rood Krisch" to hide his true identity...

title: Impure Love
summary: No summary available.

title: The Teacher of the Nobles’ Kindergarten Is Having a Hard Day Again
summary: “Ah… I still have to finish the annual event schedule and write up the meeting minutes…” I woke up inside the body of an extra—twenty years before the original story even begins. In the family, I was despised, my fiancé cheated on me, and in the end I died pointlessly in a carriage accident— ‘Huh? Did I regress… ten months before my death?!’ The moment I returned, I bolted from both my family and my unfaithful fiancé, and ended up as a kindergarten teacher, reviving a failing school… but then— “Hey, you’ve got no class.” “Did you just bark that at me?” The bratty male and female leads—who I shouldn’t have met until ten years later— are already here, bickering nonstop! And if that weren’t enough, the emperor, the mastermind villain, the wicked lady, and even a bunch of big brothers keep showing up under the excuse of “counseling sessions” at the kindergarten?!

title: It’s Annoying Because My Childhood Friend Is An Archmage
summary: A cynical noblewoman cursed to hear others' thoughts struggles to control her childhood friend—a wildly powerful mage whose flirting is as explosive as his unchecked magic. His outrageous marriage proposals ("I'll conquer the empire for you!") and her exasperated damage control create a hilarious magical rom-com where keeping him sane might just drive her mad first.

title: Miss Not-So Sidekick
summary:
Hyejung loved to read to escape her daily stress. But that's before she woke up inside the bizarre world of her favorite novel! Instead of the main heroine who courts three eligible men, she is now Latte Ectrie - a minor villain that everyone hates?! One way or another, it's a chance to live out her most beloved storyline, with popcorn in hand to watch all the drama! Taking charge of the narrative takes on a whole new meaning!

---

**Contents:** 139 + 30 (epilogue) + 9 (side story) = 178 chapters
- **Vol. 1:** main story (ch. 1-139)
- **Vol. 2:** epilogue (ch. 140-169)
- **Vol. 3:** side story (ch. 170-178)

**Links:**

- [Official French Translation](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/miss-second-role)

title: Absolute Regression
summary:
The past has changed, but like a fiery comet, he still comes. 

Mugi Hwa, the one without equal, slashed through Murim's skies with his sword, toppling every lord who dared to face him – even Cheonma, Mugeuk Geom’s father. But Mugeuk didn’t accept defeat. Instead, he turned to the forbidden: a time-bending ritual that hurled him into his own past. 

Now, retracing his steps, he races against the clock until Mugi emerges once again. But this time, it's not just about power, but mending old wounds and forging new bonds to unite his people and prepare for the bloodtide to come.

title: The Lord’s Coins Aren’t Decreasing?!
summary: Aaron Steelegard's fortune was basically set as he discovered a book that allowed him to trade across dimensions—until his enemies take both his life and his riches away. But Aaron is brought back as his younger self, armed with his past knowledge and a chance at revenge! Now free to amass coins, he's gaining powerful abilities and moving up the ranks of the interdimensional trading markets. Will Aaron gain enough coins to survive this journey of vengeance and reclaim his honor?

title: The Regressed Mercenary’s Machinations
summary:
Cecil Perdium, the Mercenary King, was killed in battle before he could avenge his family. As he faces death, he learns that Duke Delphine, the man who caused the downfall of his family, didn't work alone. 

Suddenly waking up as his teenage self, Cecil must work to both overcome his poor reputation and build up his strength to save his family. With their soldiers and knights defecting due to the harsh conditions they must endure, he has his work cut out for him. 

Can Cecil become the mighty warrior he once was and avert his family's fate?

title: Dungeon Architect
summary:
Kang Chiwoo lost his life in an accident and got reincarnated as the son of a great demon lord in another world.

Unlike his previous life as a map designer, he is now a loser named Kella.

However, in a world where magic exists and having realized the dormant power of Kella, Chiwoo sets out to achieve his goal of creating his dream map that he couldn't make in his past life...

Will Kella be able to create his own map while fending off his brothers who constantly try to kill him, the countless threats upon his life, and the pressure of those around him who want him to succeed the throne?

title: Return of the Apocalypse-Class Death Knight
summary:
Damien Haksen was once a gifted warrior with a bright future, but everything changed when a powerful Archlich twisted him into a Death Knight. Controlled by dark magic, he murdered his own family and helped destroy a kingdom. He broke free at the very end — too late to undo the damage. 

But fate gave him one more chance.

Now back in the past, Damien is determined to protect the people he once lost and destroy the dark mages who turned his life into a nightmare. This time, he’ll fight not for glory, but for love, redemption, and the future of his family.

title: Marriage of Convenience 2: An Unforgettable Song
Another Tonight
summary:
Jieunsoo was unilaterally divorced by her husband Yutaehan three years ago.
She believed she was over it—no longer caring who he dated or remarried.

That is, until she finds out he's planning to marry Yujeongha—the very woman she spent her whole life envying.

Driven by anger and desperation, Jieunsoo decides to sabotage the wedding the only way she knows how—by spending a night with her ex-husband.

“I’m going to tell Yujeongha.”
“Tell her what?”
“That we slept together.”

She lays down her carefully held card like a dagger from the heart. This was always the plan—hard-earned and calculated.
Now it was time to make her demand.

“I don’t want Yujeongha.”

Saying it out loud stings more than she expected. But she's a mother—and as a mother, her child mattered more than her pride.
There’s no way she could leave her child in the hands of a woman who despised her.

“Say it.”

His low voice was calm, unreadable.
Lowering her gaze, trembling, Jieunsoo finally looks up at the man and says:

“Tell her we slept together.”

title: The Archmage’s Restaurant
summary: A young aspiring chef suddenly finds himself in a world of war, dragons, and magic. These two worlds couldn’t be further apart... or could they? Who says you can’t open a restaurant in a fantasy realm? I mean, what could possibly go wrong? A perfect series for fantasy, magic, and food lovers.

title: When a K-Eldest Daughter Possesses a Childcare Novel
Taram Taram Taram
summary:
“Dawn” entered the hall with her calm movements and stood in the middle. Her face showed no emotions, like a doll, but she was captivating and elegant, strikingly like an ice queen. Exer smiled lightly, spread her legs, and said, ‘As Lord, I will embrace you tonight.’ A fateful encounter for the first time. A woman falls in love at first sight. And a man fights the world for this woman. ‘If this world cannot accept her as a wife, then I will change this world.’ A love story between Dawn, the Eastern girl who endured a tough childhood while fleeing from war and became a slave, and Exer, the handsome man who was known as the strongest warrior in the kingdom.

---
Arrogant Duke Ixor Malkuth is used to getting absolutely everything he wants... until he meets the beautiful Daon, a slave who refuses to give in to his demands. As the conquerer of Daon's territory, Ixor tries to treat her like his mistress, but when she runs away, he decides to charm her into loving him. Yet with every attempt to seduce her, Ixor finds himself slowly falling for her instead. Will the prideful duke succeed in stealing Daon's affection, or will he find his own heart conquered?

title: My Flower in the Desert
summary:
A collection of stories:  
  
1. The Boundary Between Archer and Scorpion  
  
2. The Long, Far Road  
Also included in [[es] ~Eternal Sisters~](https://mangadex.com/manga/4879)  
  
3. Giraffes' Necks Are Too Long  
4. The Imaginary Land  
5. Flowers Forming a Parabola  
6. Her Cat Wards Off My Bad Dream  
  
7. Itoshii no Maid-sama (Miss Beloved Maid)  
Oneshot from Yuri Hime S.  
  
8. Capturing You  
9. The Crow Woman  
10. A Love Song in a Nameless Country  
11. The Prince of the Night Sky and the Princess of the Morning Glow

title: Darling, Why Do You Regret It?
summary:
I secretly met my husband's mistress. Delicate, lovely, and sweet, her name was Saira.

“I’ll never leave the Duke!”

“Now, *that’s* the spirit.”

“W-what?”

I had reincarnated as Tareia—a noblewoman with a wealthy family, beauty, and nothing to feel inferior about in life. But there was just one obstacle in my perfect plan: “Keep seducing my husband.”

I was ready to toss him aside and live a fabulous single life. 

...Or so I thought.

“I’m starting to find you fascinating.”

“Can I call you... 'Lea'?”

“My lady, please, anything but divorce.”

Why are these men suddenly acting like this?!

---
Watching on helplessly as her beloved husband carried on a whirlwind affair with a beautiful commoner, then dying tragically only to be replaced right away by that same mistress, Duchess DeLov was a pitiful figure... in the book I didn't even bother finishing! Okay, well, I'm not going to live that way. Step one: Ruin his reputation. Step two: Secure a divorce. Step three: Enjoy my happy, rich, single life! ...Step four: Fake a relationship with a handsome stranger to shake off our stalkers.

---
Tareya DeLov awakens in a novel to find herself married to the cold and aloof Duke Anteros Mel DeLov, who's cheating on her with a mistress! Appalled, she immediately petitions for divorce, hoping to keep her share of wealth and win the public's sympathy. But as the divorce comes closer to being approved, Anteros won't leave Tareya alone, remorseful and relentlessly begging her to reconsider. Will Tareya succeed in separating from her husband? And what's with Anteros' sudden shift in attitude?

title: Talent-Swallowing Magician
summary:
The descendant of a once great wizarding family, Elric Mervinger is unable to perform magic due to a rare medical condition.

While attempting to cure his disease, he stumbles upon the demon Mephistopheles, who tries to possess Elric to free himself from a dragon’s trap. But when Elric ends up absorbing Mephisto instead, the two become bound together.

With Mephisto by his side, will this new power allow Elric to restore his family to its former glory? Or will he just end up being devoured?

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)

---

**Original Webtoon:**

- [T.Chinese](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%99%AC%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E5%B8%AB/399)

title: I Will Pay the Price for Deceiving You With My Life
summary:
I have lived only for my father. I willingly endured all suffering for the sake of avenging my father. After training in excruciating pain, I became the best assassin.

I believed in him my whole life. I lived only for my father my whole life. I even killed people for my father.

But that father was not my father. The person I killed was my real "father."

Having been deceived by a demon my entire life and killed my own father, I drank the poison he offered and died.

That must have been the case.

But I wasn't dead? When I opened my eyes, my body had shrunk. I had returned to my childhood.

title: The Max-Level Player’s 100th Regression
summary:
Earth ends up in a worldwide death game where everyone from the ages of 15 to 29 must participate.

In this 20-round death game, Ryu Min stands alone at the entrance of the last round. However, the game taunts him, killing him for having not met the entry requirement of a minimum 5-man party.

Now, on his 100th and final attempt, he uses the information he learned from his previous 99 attempts to help raise the necessary companions to reach the end. Can Ryu Min finally beat the game, or will he perish in his attempt?

title: Infinite Mage
summary:
After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

title: Survival Story of a Sword King in a Fantasy World
summary:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---

title: Return of the Namgung Clan’s Granddaughter
summary:
Following the wishes of her master, Blood Demon, Il-hwa destroys the Namgung clan, but as she faces death, she hears a shocking revelation due to Blood Demon's betrayal.  

 “Now, you are the only Namgung left in the world.”  

Il-hwa learns that she was the long-lost child of the Namgung clan, Seol-hwa, and that she was raised for Blood Demon's evil schemes. Having returned to her thirteen-year-old self from a tragic death, Il-hwa — or rather, Namgung Seol-hwa — realizes that an opportunity to change the future has arrived and takes steps to prevent the Namgung clan's annihilation.

Will Seol-hwa succeed in stopping the Blood Demon from annihilating her clan and achieving revenge?

title: The Young Wife
summary: I possessed the body of the distant ancestor of the male lead in a martial arts novel where he dominates everything. To faithfully fulfill my role of supporting him, I worked myself to the bone and established the greatest family. After that, I peacefully closed my eyes. "What? My family has collapsed?!" When I opened my eyes again, 300 years had passed. The family I had painstakingly built was on the brink of ruin. On top of that, the male lead I dedicated my life to cheering for was about to enter a humiliating political marriage with the villainess from the original story. But the biggest problem was... "Why did I become that villainess!"

title: A Mouse Biting a Dragon’s Tail
Royal Shop of Young Lady
summary:
Graciela Mendoza was sentenced to death. After her father's death, Graciela, the eldest daughter of a ducal family, was tricked by her uncle into taking over the family home, and was then accused of the crime and decapitated along with her young brother. However, she finds herself back where she was five years ago...? For the second time in her life, she will never make a mistake again. Even if I have to disguise my younger brother as my son, I will survive stubbornly.

---
* [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3718id/)

title: My Master Doesn’t Bite People
summary:
"Am I going to die just trying to buy my own house?!"

Luci, a maid lured in by a high salary, ends up at a remote mansion. Her employer? Ska, a half-dragon with a notorious reputation for being insane.

"The salary must include hazard pay for putting up with his temper, right? That's a fair deal!"

Smashing up the house on a whim? Kicking her out just because he hates her hair color?—As long as she thinks of it all as part of the service fee, she can endure it!

But wait... when she looks closely, her master turns out to be kind of… cute? Huh? The way he looks at her is starting to change...? No way—! My master hates humans!

title: Unshakable Female Lead in Regret Genre
The Reason Why That Villainess Picked Up A Sword
summary:
Erin suffered her entire life from the abuse of the Marchioness and the malicious rumors she spread, until she finally died.

After two reincarnations, she returned as a genius Sword Master.

This time, everything will be different.

---
"Your Majesty wants you to hear this. Your family will soon follow you."

Murdered after years of abuse and false accusations from her stepmother. Thought it was over, after two reincarnations, she returned to her original self, Erin Rexus, known as the greatest villainess. Before losing everything and even losing her loved ones.

"I know there are things you can't tell me. When you're ready, tell me."

The kind and compassionate Second Prince, Ferdin Rexus. When she returned to the past and faced him again, she vowed to herself. She would save him. Even if it meant becoming a true villainess.

title: I Don’t Want to Work!
summary:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...
